OOC: Sorry about the wait Kslawdogg.

BIC:

Megatron looked around, then saw the fireball's heading towards him. He
turned his back to the inferno, moving Triggerhappy over on his
shoulder. He gritted his teeth as the flame bit into his back, scorching
his back armor. It took everything he had to keep a hold of his warrior.
He then looked back through winced eyes at Hot Spot. "Leave Protectobot,
this does not concern you."
